description:
Goku astounds Captain Ginyu with his amazing new powers, but the Captain still has a few tricks up his sleeve!  Meanwhile, Frieza arrives at the home of the Eldest Namek and begins a battle with the noble warrior, Nail!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freezer à la recherche du mot magique
Tatakai no Yukue!? Sai Chourou ni Semaru Freezer no Ma no Te
ท่านผู้เฒ่าสูงสุดอยู่ในอันตราย! ฟรีสเซอร์ผู้ชั่วร้ายมาถึงแล้ว
闘いの行方!? 最長老に迫るフリーザの魔の手
